title: Soft opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin
text:
Soft opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin Soft opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin Details Category: Hotel   15:30 Located in the tranquil area of Sha Tin, Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin is only a 5-minute stroll to the nearby Shek Mun Station. The award winning hotel is pleased to announce the soft opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar, the rooftop venue which graces its top floor on the 30th. Boasting breathtaking views of Sha Tin, LEVELthirty’s stylish ambience offers a new and intimate hot spot in New Territories, with a choice of both outdoor and indoor seating 
Gather with business associates at the stunning rooftop bar, to unwind and immerse in an extensive list of wine and champagne, and an array of delectable Asian and Western Tapas served by friendly and efficient staff. Take in the beautiful skyline with the bar’s signature cocktails mixed with summer fruits using premium spirits and the freshest ingredients, named after some of the champion horses from past international Derby, namely Makybe Diva, American Pharaoh, Treve, and a few more others. With an exquisite menu featuring Asian and Western Tapas, 10” pizzas made with sumptuous toppings and finger licking bar bites, LEVELthirty is a great place to enjoy perfectly curated food and beverage with panoramic views of the Sha Tin Racecourse and Tolo Harbour. Whether you plan to throw a birthday bash or a surprised wedding proposal party, LEVELthirty and the adjacent world class meeting venues is the place to host your private event and enjoy heartening food with your choice of fine wine to add some glamor to the occasion. Happy hour spans from 5pm to 8pm daily, so come early to secure your favourite seat, be it the comfy sofa seats overlooking the Racecourse or the bar tables close to the wine dispenser perfect for wine lovers!
